title: Introduction
description: Beautiful UI components for React, crafted with the Wedges design system, Radix UI, and TailwindCSS.

body.raw:
<PreviewComponent name="AvatarDemo" />

### Another Example

Renders when the checkbox is in a checked or indeterminate state. You can style this element directly, or you can use it as a wrapper to put an icon into, or both.
